data.lyric:
[ti:‘tis the damn season]
[ar:Taylor Swift]
[al:evermore]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]tis the damn season - Taylor Swift (泰勒·斯威夫特)
[00:04.65]Lyrics by：Aaron Dessner/Taylor Swift
[00:09.31]Composed by：Aaron Dessner/Taylor Swift
[00:13.96]If I wanted to know who you were hanging with
[00:17.64]While I was gone I would have asked you
[00:20.49]It's the kind of cold fogs up windshield glass
[00:24.52]But I felt it when I passed you
[00:27.19]There's an ache in you
[00:29.00]Put there by the ache in me
[00:31.51]
[00:33.66]But if it's all the same to you
[00:36.01]It's the same to me
[00:37.94]
[00:38.67]So we could call it even
[00:40.52]You could call me "babe" for the weekend
[00:43.79]'Tis the d**n season write this down
[00:46.82]I'm staying at my parents' house
[00:49.14]And the road not taken looks real good now
[00:52.60]And it always leads to you and my hometown
[00:57.86]
[00:59.99]I parked my car right between the Methodist
[01:03.97]And thе school that used to be ours
[01:06.43]The holidays linger like bad perfume
[01:10.54]You can run but only so far
[01:13.14]I escaped it too remember how you watched me leave
[01:17.64]
[01:19.73]But if it's okay with you it's okay with me
[01:24.25]
[01:24.84]We could call it even
[01:26.54]You could call me "babe" for the weekend
[01:29.72]​'Tis the d**n season write this down
[01:32.89]I'm staying at my parents' house
[01:35.02]And the road not taken looks real good now
[01:39.31]Time flies messy as the mud on your truck tires
[01:42.99]Now I'm missing your smile hear me out
[01:46.26]We could just ride around
[01:48.26]And the road not taken looks real good now
[01:51.87]And it always leads to you and my hometown
[01:57.05]
[01:59.00]Sleep in half the day just for old times' sake
[02:05.60]I won't ask you to wait if you don't ask me to stay
[02:10.67]So I'll go back to L A and the so-called friends
[02:14.43]Who'll write books about me if I ever make it
[02:18.05]And wonder about the only soul who can tell which smiles I'm faking
[02:24.50]And the heart I know I'm breaking is my own
[02:29.47]
[02:31.27]To leave the warmest bed I've ever known
[02:36.22]
[02:37.18]We could call it even
[02:40.45]
[02:43.79]Even though I'm leaving
[02:46.96]
[02:49.84]And I'll be yours for the weekend
[02:53.62]​'Tis the d**n season
[02:57.06]We could call it even
[02:58.62]You could call me "babe" for the weekend
[03:01.77]​'Tis the d**n season write this down
[03:04.91]I'm staying at my parents' house
[03:07.20]And the road not taken looks real good now
[03:11.31]Time flies messy as the mud on your truck tires
[03:15.01]Now I'm missing your smile hear me out
[03:18.29]We could just ride around
[03:20.36]And the road not taken looks real good now
[03:23.82]And it always leads to you and my hometown
[03:29.14]
[03:30.38]And it always leads to you and my hometown
data.trans:
[ti:‘tis the damn season]
[ar:Taylor Swift]
[al:evermore]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:04.65]//
[00:09.30]//
[00:13.96]如果我想知道你跟谁在一起
[00:17.64]等我离开 我会向你寻找答案
[00:20.49]挡风玻璃上凝结着一层冰冷的雾气
[00:24.52]当我从你身边经过时 我能够感受到
[00:27.19]你心底隐隐作痛
[00:29.00]我心的苦楚让你苦不堪言
[00:31.51]
[00:33.66]可如果一切对你来说都一样
[00:36.01]那我也无所谓
[00:37.94]
[00:38.67]所以 我们可以说彼此互不相欠
[00:40.52]周末时光 你可以亲昵地唤我一声宝贝
[00:43.79]这糟糕的时节 把一切都记下来
[00:46.82]我待在我父母家里
[00:49.14]如今 这条人迹罕至的路看起来分外迷人
[00:52.60]它总是通往你与我的家乡
[00:57.86]
[00:59.99]我把车停在卫理公会和
[01:03.97]曾经属于我们的学校之间
[01:06.43]假日悠长 就像劣质的香水味一样挥之不去
[01:10.54]你可以逃离 但是跑不了多远
[01:13.14]我也拼命逃走 还记得你注视着我离开时落寞的样子
[01:17.64]
[01:19.73]可如果你觉得称心如意 我也没有关系
[01:24.25]
[01:24.84]我们可以说彼此互不相欠
[01:26.54]周末时光 你可以亲昵地唤我一声宝贝
[01:29.72]​这糟糕的时节 把一切都记下来
[01:32.89]我待在我父母家里
[01:35.02]如今 这条人迹罕至的路看起来分外迷人
[01:39.31]时光飞逝 就像你汽车轮胎上的污泥一样凌乱
[01:42.99]如今 我想念你的微笑 侧耳聆听
[01:46.26]我们可以到处转转
[01:48.26]如今 这条人迹罕至的路看起来分外迷人
[01:51.87]它总是通往你与我的家乡
[01:57.05]
[01:59.00]念及旧日情分 睡上半日
[02:05.60]如果你不愿挽留我 我不会要求你等待
[02:10.67]所以 我会回到洛杉矶 那些所谓的朋友
[02:14.43]他们会为我著书立说 只要我功成名就
[02:18.05]我想知道那个一眼可以分辨出我强颜欢笑的人
[02:24.50]我知道 我伤害的那颗心正是我的
[02:29.47]
[02:31.27]离开我熟悉的温床
[02:36.22]
[02:37.18]我们可以说彼此互不相欠
[02:40.45]
[02:43.79]即使我转身离开
[02:46.96]
[02:49.84]周末时光 我会属于你
[02:53.62]​这糟糕的时节
[02:57.06]我们可以说彼此互不相欠
[02:58.62]周末时光 你可以亲昵地唤我一声宝贝
[03:01.77]​这糟糕的时节 把一切都记下来
[03:04.91]我待在我父母家里
[03:07.20]如今 这条人迹罕至的路看起来分外迷人
[03:11.31]时光飞逝 就像你汽车轮胎上的污泥一样凌乱
[03:15.01]如今 我想念你的微笑 侧耳聆听
[03:18.29]我们可以到处转转
[03:20.36]如今 这条人迹罕至的路看起来分外迷人
[03:23.82]它总是通往你与我的家乡
